mapper.select: SELECT PROD_ID , PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU, PROD_BUYER , PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_INSDATE , LPROD_NM "lprod.lprodNm" , BUYER_NAME "buyer.buyerName" , BUYER_ADD1 "buyer.buyerAdd1", BUYER_CHARGER "buyer.buyerCharger" FROM PROD INNER JOIN LPROD ON(PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) INNER JOIN BUYER ON(PROD_BUYER=BUYER_ID)

WITH PRODVIEW AS ( SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU , PROD_BUYER, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE , PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_DETAIL , PROD_IMG, PROD_TOTALSTOCK, PROD_INSDATE , PROD_PROPERSTOCK, PROD_SIZE, PROD_COLOR , PROD_DELIVERY, PROD_UNIT, PROD_QTYIN , PROD_QTYSALE, PROD_MILEAGE , LPROD_NM "lprod.lprodNm" FROM PROD INNER JOIN LPROD ON (PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) ), BUYERVIEW AS ( SELECT BUYER_ID , BUYER_NAME, BUYER_LGU , BUYER_BANK, BUYER_BANKNO, BUYER_BANKNAME , BUYER_ADD1 , BUYER_CHARGER , LPROD_NM FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) ), CARTVIEW AS( SELECT CART_PROD, CART_MEMBER, MEM_NAME, MEM_ID FROM CART INNER JOIN MEMBER ON (CART_MEMBER = MEM_ID) ) SELECT PRODVIEW.*, BUYERVIEW.* , MEM_ID, MEM_NAME FROM PRODVIEW INNER JOIN BUYERVIEW ON (PROD_BUYER = BUYER_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTVIEW ON (PROD_ID = CART_PROD) WHERE PROD_ID = 'P101000001'
